description:
Greenfoot is an integrated development environment using Java or Stride designed primarily for educational purposes at the high school and undergraduate level.

Greenfoot is an integrated development environment using Java or Stride designed primarily for educational purposes at the high school and undergraduate level. It allows easy development of two-dimensional graphical applications, such as simulations and interactive games.
- Upgraded to Java 21 including support for new language features.
- Added code completion for local variables.
- Fixed bug with compiler errors sometimes not showing.
- Improved Mac startup speed (especially on new Apple Silicon build).
- Added Raspberry Pi Linux build.
- Several Java and Stride editor bug fixes.
- Fixed a bug where the Windows MSI installer would allow multiple per-machine installations of different versions (in the same directory). Greenfoot 3.9.0 should correctly remove all prior per-machine installations of earlier Greenfoot versions.
